Title: Establishes the crimes of assault on a child protective services worker, aggravated assault on a child protective services worker and menacing a child protective services worker
Summary: Establishes the crimes of assault on a child protective services worker, aggravated assault on a child protective services worker and menacing a child protective services worker.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to penalties for assault and menacing of child protective services workers
